Package org.example.galaxy_trucker.View.ClientModel.States

package org.example.galaxy_trucker.View.ClientModel.States
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.example.galaxy_trucker.View.ClientModel
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AcceptClient
    The AcceptClient class represents a specific state in the game where the client can either accept or decline a particular action.
    AddCrewClient
    The AddCrewClient class is responsible for handling the "Add Crew" state during the game.
    BaseStateClient
    The BaseStateClient class extends PlayerStateClient and represents the base state of the client-side game logic.
    BuildingClient
    Represents a client state for the "Building" phase of the game.
    CheckValidityClient
    The CheckValidityClient class is a concrete implementation of the PlayerStateClient abstract class.
    ChoosePositionClient
    Represents a specific client-side state during the game where a player is required to choose a position.
    ChoosingPlanetClient
    The ChoosingPlanetClient class represents the client state where a player is in the process of selecting a planet during the game.
    ConsumingEnergyClient
    ConsumingEnergyClient represents a specific state of a player where energy is being consumed in the game.
    DefendingFromLargeClient
    Represents the defensive state of a player when defending against a large attack, extending the PlayerStateClient abstract class.
    DefendingFromSmallClient
    The DefendingFromSmallClient class represents the player's state during a small-scale defense scenario within the game.
    FinishStateClient
    Represents the finish state of a player during the game.
    GiveAttackClient
    This class represents the client state for handling the "Give Attack" action in the game.
    GiveSpeedClient
    The GiveSpeedClient class is a client-side representation of the "Give Speed" state in the game.
    HandleCargoClient
    The HandleCargoClient class represents a specific state in the game where the player handles their cargo.
    HandleDestructionClient
    The HandleDestructionClient class is responsible for managing the state of handling ship destruction in the game.
    HandleTheftClient
    The HandleTheftClient class extends the PlayerStateClient to represent the state where the player is handling a theft scenario in the game.
    KillingClient
    The KillingClient class represents a specific player state where the player is performing actions related to "killing".
    LobbyClient
    The LobbyClient class represents a state where the player is in the lobby of the game.
    LoginClient
    The LoginClient class represents the initial state for a user in the game, allowing them to log in and perform primary actions like joining a lobby, creating a new game, or reconnecting to an existing session.
    PlayerStateClient
    The PlayerStateClient class is an abstract representation of a player's state within the game.
    ReadCardClient
    The ReadCardClient class represents the game state where the player has drawn a new card.
    SeeBoardsClient
    The SeeBoardsClient class is a concrete implementation of the PlayerStateClient class, representing a state in which the player views game boards.
    SeeLog
    The SeeLog class is a concrete implementation of the PlayerStateClient abstract class.
    WaitingClient
    The WaitingClient class represents a state where the player is waiting for other players in the game.
